name: Elemental Shrine
description:
Elemental Shrine is a top-down shooter made for Ludum Dare 51. 

There are some bugs and some features were not implemented due to lack of time.

🔥 How to play:
  • Change your element by interacting with the shrine in the middle.
  • Enemies from the same element as you are immune to your shots. They will change element every 10 seconds.
  • Eliminate all enemies to go to the next level. 
🧊 Controls: 
  • WASD to move.
  • LEFT CLICK to shoot.
  • RIGHT CLICK to change weapon.
  • SPACEBAR to interact.
  • ESC to pause.
